attributes.action: Make a deal with our European neighbours to allow European television channels to be broadcast on Freeview.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are utterly isolated in terms of information from television which is virtually monopolised between the BBC and Rupert Murdoch's empire. Not even Irish channels are available. We need this greater variety to, amongst other things, create a greater feeling of unity with our neighbours and to aid language development.
